1.content:
Tonight is the night. You have a date with your girlfriend DJ. You arrive at her house at around 7pm. You knock on the door and her sister Stephanie answers.

"Hello?" she says.

"Hey I'm here to pick up DJ. We've got a date tonight." You replied.

"Oh." She then screamed, "DJ!". "Heh, why don't you come in?."

"Alright." You responded as you entered their living room.

"I'll go get her." Stephanie said as she started running upstairs. You look around the room while waiting. Then you start to smell something weird. You get dizzy and eventually pass out. When you wake up and come to your senses you realize you're a little less than an inch tall. You're in shock.

"Alright I'm ready." DJ said as her and Stephanie came down the stairs. DJ looked around for you but could not see you due to your size.

"I swear he was here." Stephanie said.

"Steph this isn't funny. Now come get me when he's actually here." DJ replied. She then headed back towards her room.

"Okay whatever." Stephanie said. She then sat on the couch and watched TV.
You stood on the floor scared and frozen. But you knew you had to find someone to help you. Since Stephanie was near you, you could try to get her help? What do you do?

"No....NO!!!", You screamed and Kimmy placed you in her sandals. The interior of the shoe was smelly and sweaty and at this point you was scared that he was going to be squished. "Here comes my stinky feet.", Kimmy said wiggling her toes. Kimmy's foot slid into the sandal and trapped you underneath her toes.
133211111112111211221212222111121.title: She catches you

1332111111121112112212122221111211.content: She placed her other sandal on her foot, unlocked the door, and opened it. At this point DJ was at the front door and saw Kimmy had open toed shoes on DJ asked is it a good idea to wear sandal, Kimmy reassured her that it’s fine and they way to the mall. You during the walk in the mall was having a tough time trying to avoid the sweat that was dripping on you from Kimmy's foot. Sadly, you’re not very muscular and couldn't crawl from under her toes and get to the top of her toes This would have to be the worst situation Bobby has been in so far. You knew that you had to contact Kimmy somehow and get out of her sandal. The possibilities of either biting, tickling, or licking her toe would get Kimmy's attention. Biting would probably upset her, tickling would probably get you squished, the sandal had a bit of spare room, so you might get squished if Kimmy's foot quickly moved into you. Or if you licked her foot, she might like it and get you out of her sandal. You chose to lick her toe. You then began to lick her toe as best you could. Kimmy could feel it.
1332111111121112112212122221111211.title: Kimmy and DJ arrived at the mall

13321111111211121122121222211112111.content: While Kimmy and DJ was walking to the shoe store you started to lick Kimmy’s stinky big toe she felt it and tried not to laugh she then said “hey deej I gotta go to the ladies room brb” she then left but then DJ said “kimmy has been acting weird oh well” when she got to the restroom kimmy yelled to you “ IF YOU EVEN WANT TO THINK ABOUT STAYING WITH ME, THEN YOU BETTER PROVE HOW SORRY YOU ARE!” Kimmy places her large feet down on your chest, making you gasp for air as you squirm between her toes. The large teen couldn’t help but laugh at your struggles as you push away from her toes. You lean your arms against her large and second toe in an attempt to avoid the horrid stench but Kimmy easily destroys your efforts as she begins to wiggle her toes causing your arms to fall and another onslaught of toe assaults and sweat bang against you
13321111111211121122121222211112111.title: She don’t like it

choices: Lick her butt to cause uncontrollable farting

She laughed as she adjusted her thong forcing you in her crack "AHH much better." She sighs and leaves the ladies room "this is going to make driving that much better feeling him wiggle around in there." Kimmy laughed. You have to find a way out of here but how

info.brief_description: What happens when you get shrunk in the sitcom, Full House?
info.description:
You are Nick. An average 17 year old boy. You are dating DJ tanner, and currently have a date scheduled with her on Saturday night. When you arrive to pick her up, things get weird. You shrink! How will you survive in the Tanner household?

Anything goes.
